DOC.brief_summary: This observational, non-interventional cohort study will evaluate predictors of response in patients with chronic hepatitis B receiving standard of care Pegasys therapy. Efficacy and safety parameters will also be evaluated. Patients included in the study will be followed for the duration of their treatment and for up to 3 years thereafter.
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Cohort Study in Patients With Chronic Hepatitis B Receiving Pegasys
DOC.criteria: adult patient, >/= 18 years of age chronic hepatitis B treatment with peginterferon alfa2A coinfection with HAV, HCV and HIV
